projects.title: Kaomoji.click
projects.description: A simple tool for discovering and copying Japanese kaomoji. One click to copy — designed to work across devices and languages.

projects.title: Fair Share Calculator
projects.description: A tool for couples to fairly split shared expenses based on income. Just enter each partner's after-tax salary and shared costs, and it works out a proportional split—making money conversations more objective, equitable, and stress-free.

projects.title: Lost Cities Score Calculator
projects.description: A scoring tool for the board game Lost Cities with a skeuomorphic interface that matches the game's look and feel. No pen, paper, or mental maths needed.

projects.title: SCP Reader
projects.description: A clean, focused reading interface for SCP Foundation entries. Strips away wiki clutter and presents stories in a distraction-free format designed for long reading sessions.

projects.title: Flip 7 Scorecard
projects.description: A digital scorecard for the card game Flip 7. Track scores across rounds with running totals — no pen and paper needed.
